_meta.description: Sunday Dinner v1 feature tracking - Status: not-started | in-progress | pass | fail | blocked

project-setup.notes: Next.js 14 (App Router), TypeScript strict, Tailwind CSS, Supabase client, ESLint + Prettier

core-types.notes: Recipe, Meal, Timeline, Task, Shopping types and contracts

database-schema.notes: Supabase migrations created and applied: recipes, meals, meal_recipes, timelines, tasks tables + RLS policies + storage bucket

base-components.notes: Button, Card, Input, Label, Modal, Skeleton, Toast, ErrorBoundary using Radix UI + CVA. Fraunces display font. Demo at /demo

ai-layer.notes: ClaudeAIService with visionExtractRecipe, generateTimeline, reviewScaling, suggestRecalculation. URL/PDF stubbed for Week 4.

pwa-infrastructure.notes: PWA manifest.json, Service Worker with cache strategies (cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate), useOffline hook, OfflineIndicator component

app-shell.notes: Layout component, navigation, error boundaries, toast system

recipe-photo-ingestion.notes: Photo upload, Claude Vision extraction, side-by-side correction UI

recipe-manual-entry.notes: Manual entry form, extraction failure handling

recipe-url-scraping.notes: URL input, scraping service for common recipe sites + generic fallback

recipe-pdf-parsing.notes: Single-page PDF upload and parsing via Claude Vision

shopping-list.notes: Generation, unit reconciliation, store sections, persistent staples

meal-setup.notes: Create meal, add recipes, set guest count and serve time

recipe-scaling.notes: Scaling factor per recipe, Claude scaling review

timeline-generation.notes: Claude generates timeline, deterministic validator, conflict detection

timeline-editing.notes: Edit tasks (time, duration), reordering, deletion, regeneration

integration-week-6.notes: Recipe → Meal → Timeline → Shopping flow integration testing

kitchen-walkthrough.notes: Ready Check modal with auto-generated checklist from first hour tasks

live-execution-core.notes: Start Cooking button, Now/Next/Later live view, task checkoff with undo

timers.notes: Local timers, audio/visual alerts, active timer banner

running-behind.notes: I'm behind button, Claude recalculation, accept/adjust/manual options

large-text-mode.notes: Font size toggle, wake lock API, iOS fallback (silent video loop)

offline-resilience.notes: IndexedDB queue, Service Worker caching, sync on reconnect, offline +15min fallback

share-link-schema.notes: meal_share_tokens table, RLS policies, UUID v4 token generation

share-link-viewer.notes: Share link viewer route, token validation, read-only view, polling updates

share-integration.notes: Link expiration (serve time + 24h), expiration recalculation, integration testing

integration-week-9.notes: Live Mode + Share Links full integration, offline scenarios

ios-safari-testing.notes: PWA install, background/lock/unlock, wake lock, audio, offline on iOS

performance.notes: Lighthouse audit (≥90 mobile), bundle size, image optimization

final-testing.notes: Real 20-person meal test, family member share link test, 5+ recipe cards

ship.notes: P0 bug fixes, production deployment, smoke test
